verses.roman:
ei ślokera saṅkṣepārtha śuna, bhakta-gaṇa
jagannātha dekhi' yaiche prabhura bhāvana

synonyms: ei—this; ślokera—of the verse; saṅkṣepa-artha—a brief explanation; śuna—hear; bhakta-gaṇa—O devotees; jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; dekhi'-after seeing; yaiche—just as; prabhura—of Lord Caitanya; bhāvana—the thinking.
translation: Now, O devotees, please hear a brief explanation of this verse. Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu was thinking in this way after having seen the Jagannātha Deity.
